tweet: #IOTA is a revolutionary new transaction settlement and data transfer layer for the #IoT. Exchange Hub: Formerly known as #IXI Hub; enables exchanges to integrate #IOTA in days or weeks instead of months, just by connecting Hub to their existing trading platform!
